name: Teeboxer
overview:
Teeboxer is a collaborative application for golfers putting together rounds, events, tracking statistics, and finding new golf partners.

Teeboxer integrates with Facebook, GMail, LinkedIn, Plaxo, and Salesforce for sign in and to provide users access to their contacts and calendars. It uses Twilio to provide text messaging and voice interfaces in addition to the web app.

milestones.source_description: Teeboxer launches beta to make getting a round of golf together faster and easier
